name: Titan Tank Wars 3D
description:
Use joystick for move the tank and tap targets to shoot. Destroy all enemy tanks!

There are 36 levels and 6 types of AI tanks to fight against.

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive tank simulation game.

Suitable for children and all ages. Enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !

■Game center support:
Compare your best top score with others in the world.

■Social sharing:
Share your new score and challenge with your friends circle.
